Researcher Gennai invented the soul and pork driver, and by blending the collected souls with the registrant's soul, he succeeds in creating a "Karakuri" that is attached to the registrant.

name: Re:Award - More Corridor 1
description: Short third person game. The game is a free add-on to the base game.

name: Dive
description: DIVE is a Nier-inspired 3rd person shooter with light puzzle and platforming mechanics. Explore an artificial and abandoned world while trying to overcome its trials and enemies.

name: Interdimension
description: Design, modify and reinforce your spaceship in a more freely noval sandbox building way. Operate independent modules and beat distinctive enemys with smart strategy. Explore procedual generated galaxy map and plan the route. Also have an online battle with your friends, either PvP or PvE.

name: Unnatural Investigations
description: 4 player online coop game, investigate crime scenes, determine the cause, establish a plan, take on the boss

name: AMaze DOS
description: uncomplicated green DOS puzzle. will take you to a world of old games that lacked cool graphics and gameplay. The game used a recursive backtracking search algorithm.

name: Soul Fantasy
description: The white colossus fell from the sky, and the Demon Led Countless Demons to destroy all good things. For the future of the planet, for the belief in their hearts, five girls from different places, with different identities gathered together, embarked on the road to the demon king.

name: Wuhan Clan
description: Wuhan Clan is a retro inspired pixel art platformer with a modern twist!

name: Dwarffarian
description: Dwarffarian is an indie RPG adventure game where the main character is a dwarf. You have to travel through several fantasy locations, meeting various creatures on the way, completing quests, fighting enemies in dungeons and on open maps.

name: Forbidden Fruit
description: This is a story about brother and sister seeking their missing father on a mysterious island. Adventure awaits you in tropical lands full of secrets! You’ll make new friends, learn new things and battle many different enemies. Forbidden island is waiting for you.

name: Spermicide
description: Play as a microscope spermicide craft with only one goal. Don't let the sperm reach the egg by any means necessary! Don't like preventing pregnancy? Cause it! With Be The Sperm!

name: Dream Hacker
description: With the help of the dream machine, you can invade the dreams of sleeping girls. Here you can do whatever you want, or you can help them by interpreting their dreams and then collecting the “reward” you want.

name: New Year Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Holiday Time
description: Holiday time (holiday time) is a light leisure game, players need to participate in the flying needle game here, get the reward constantly stronger, and win the final championship on the island!

name: Bomb It
description: Bomb It is an amazing Bomberman game that lets you battle out intense competitions by yourself or together with a friend. Place your bombs strategically to blow up the enemies and destroy objects. You can pick up power-ups that will give you various advantages, such as increase your maximum life and freezing the enemies. Have fun!

name: Basketball
description: Instead of a vacation, go on a short, light adventure through virtual reality, religion, and of course, basketball.

name: Gaze of the Eyeless
description: Gaze of the Eyeless is a 2D action adventure platformer! Choose your own path through the unwinding caverns of the underworld. Use ancient swords and guns to fight horrific monsters. Make friends, enemies, and Meet elder gods! Can you survive the unwinding caverns of the underworld?

name: The Celestra
description: Celestra is a text-based online RPG in which you’ll play one of the crew on a sci-fi ship exploring the galaxy and trying to save their home. Choose from one of seven departments and raise your skills as you embark on missions throughout the cosmos.

name: Live or Die
description: You have been selected as a new contestant to play in a twisted puzzle game designed by an up and coming serial killer known as the Game Master. Using your intuition and survival skills, can you stay one step ahead of the Game Master or end up as another one of his many victims?

name: Table Gun
description: The world need a hero to free the tables!

name: Tcstrikers4
description: This is the biggest news title of 2021. A cute bullet-hell shooter is now available. The game features cool and futuristic visuals and active gameplay.

name: Krampus Kills
description: In this Home Alone meets Doom fright fest, fight off Krampus on Christmas Eve, in a terrifying, double-barrel wielding, jump-scaring, thrill ride!

name: Sword Maker
description: This is an intuitive design app that allows you to create your own sword designs from a wide range of parts. You can upload your sword to the server to share it with other users around the world, and you can also customize it.

name: Sphere: The Knight of Elf
description: Sphere travels to find the clue that her friend missed. In the world where Human, Beasts, Elves, three of them fight each other, find and solve the riddles!

name: Bomb It 2
description:
Bomb It 2 is the second instalment of this awesome arcade series that takes inspiration from the original and iconic Bomberman game. In this game you must move around a map littered with obstacles and platforms and try to destroy the other players in the game using your deadly bombs!

Bomb It 2 builds upon what made the first title so popular and provides a range of exciting new game modes. When placing your bombs, be sure to have an escape route so you do not destroy yourself. Also, try to trap enemy players by forcing them into a corner and providing them with no way to evade your bomb. This game is a heap of fun and you will find yourself racing around the maps plating bombs for hours!

name: Dominion: Renaissance
description: Renaissance is the 12th expansion to Dominion. It includes 25 new Kingdom cards. There are tokens that let you save coins and actions for later, Projects that grant abilities, and Artifacts to fight over.

name: Dominion: Intrigue
description: Intrigue is the 1st expansion to Dominion. It includes 26 new Kingdom cards. There are victory cards that do things for you, underlings that give you a choice as to what they do, and a variety of other cards. It adds up to six players support.

name: Dominion: Alchemy
description: Alchemy is the 3rd expansion Dominion. It adds 12 new Kingdom cards plus a new resource, Potions.

name: Dominion: Dark Ages
description: Dark Ages is the 7th expansion to Dominion. It adds 35 new Kingdom cards to Dominion, plus new bad cards you give to other players (Ruins), new cards to replace starting Estates (Shelters), and cards you can only get via specific other cards. The central themes are the trash and upgrading.

name: Dominion: Hinterlands
description: Hinterlands is 6th expansion to Dominion. It adds 26 new Kingdom cards to Dominion, including 20 Actions, 3 Treasures, 3 Victory cards, and 3 Reactions. The central theme is cards that do something immediately when you buy them or gain them.

name: Dominion: Adventures
description: This is the 9th expansion to the game of Dominion. It has 400 cards, 6 mats, and 60 tokens. There are 30 new Kingdom cards, including the return of Duration cards that do things on future turns, plus Reserve cards that can be saved for the right moment. There are also 20 Event cards.

name: Dominion: Guilds
description: Guilds is the 8th expansion to Dominion. It adds 13 new Kingdom cards to Dominion. It has coin tokens that you can save to spend later, and cards you can get more out of by paying extra for them.

name: Dominion: Base Set - 1st Edition
description: Play with Chancellor, Woodcutter, Feast, Spy, Thief, and Adventurer in this set of cards that were included in the original release of the Base game.

name: Dominion: Nocturne
description: This is the 11th expansion to Dominion. It includes 33 new Kingdom cards. There are Night cards, which are played after the Buy phase, Heirlooms that replace starting Coppers, Fate and Doom cards that give out Boons and Hexes, and a variety of extra cards that other cards can provide.

name: Dominion: Cornucopia
description: Cronucopia is the 5th expansion to Dominion. It adds 13 new Kingdom cards to Dominion, plus 5 unique cards. The central theme is variety; there are cards that reward you for having a variety of cards in your deck, in your hand, and in play, as well cards that help you get that variety.

name: Dominion: Prosperity
description: This is the 4th expansion to the game of Dominion. It adds 25 new Kingdom cards, 2 new Basic cards that let players keep building up past Gold and Province. The central theme is wealth; there are treasures with abilities, cards that interact with treasures, and powerful expensive cards.

name: Dominion: Empires
description: Empires, the 10th addition to the game of Dominion, adds 24 Kingdom cards, cards you can buy now and pay for later, piles with two different cards, and Landmarks that add new ways to score. VP tokens and Events return from previous sets.

name: Dominion: Promo Pack 2
description: This pack includes five new cards, Captain, Church, Dismantle, Sauna, Avanto and one new Event, Summon. Sauna and Avanto share a split pile.

name: Dominion: Seaside
description: Seaside is the 2nd expansion for Dominion. It adds 26 new Kingdom cards to Dominion. Its central theme is your next turn; there are cards that do something this turn and next, cards that set up your next turn, and other ways to step outside of the bounds of a normal turn.

name: Dominion: Intrigue - 1st Edition
description: Play with Secret Chamber, Great Hall, Coppersmith, Scout, Saboteur and Tribute in this set of cards that were included in the original release of Intrigue.

name: Dominion: Menagerie
description: Menagerie is the 13th expansion to Dominion. It includes 30 new Kingdom cards. There are Horses that save a draw for later, Exile mats that cards can be sent to and rescued from, and Ways that give Actions another option. Events return.

name: Bomb It 3
description:
Bomb it 3 is the third instalment of the hugely popular Bomb It series. This title builds upon everything that made the original titles so popular and adds some new features and levels. The gameplay remains the same – you control a single character and you must move around each level and try to eliminate all other opponents by planting bombs on the ground.

Try to place bombs strategically to catch your opponents unawares or trap them in a corner, but at the same time avoid getting caught short and being trapped yourself. This third title brings a whole host of new game modes and levels to play across, plus some awesome power-ups and special abilities. Do you have what it takes to conquer the Bomb It arena?

name: Bomb It 4
description:
Bomb It 4 is the fourth version of this fantastic Bomberman style game in which you must test out your bomb dropping skills on a myriad of different levels. The gameplay remains the same as the previous versions - you control a single character and you must move around each level and deploy bombs to try and destroy your enemies without being killed yourself.

In this episode, you can actually customize your character and kit them out with a range of different cool outfits. Furthermore, enjoy several new game modes including co-op mode in which you can fight with a friend against AI opponents.

name: Bomb It 5
description:
Bomb it 5 is the fifth instalment of this epic platform game that takes gameplay elements from the original and iconic Bomberman series. If you have played any of the previous Bomb It episodes then you will already love the frantic arcade gameplay and the fun bombing action. In this instalment you can take part in a number of new game modes and battle across new levels.

As usual you must move around the map and attempt to plant bombs to destroy your opponents. Be careful and avoid becoming trapped as you could end up blowing yourself up or being cornered by another player. Don’t forget to smash the blocks to get power-ups to improve your damage and survivability. Can you conquer Bomb It and show off your destructive skills?

name: Martian Escape
description: Martian Escape is a tap-to-fly arcade side scroller on mobile

name: The Northern Gate: Special Agent
description: Save the world from the monsters invading! With your flying board, keep moving, get weapons, and kill the monsters! Don't forget to make strategies before every combat because it won't be an easy fight!

name: Heroes of Egypt: The Curse of Sethos
description: Safely locked away in a temple complex for ages, sinister powers are unleashed, causing chaos and a momentous curse. Your path will take you and your cuddly Egyptians through different landscapes. Defeat countless creatures and lose no time to lift the curse!

name: The Mysterious Misadventures of Mollie & Mordecai
description: Mollie and Mordecai are transformed into dolls by an evil wizard, and have to team up to find his magical book to change themselves back.

name: SpookyKillers
description: Spooky zOmBiEs are getting close! Have fun tonight playing alone or with 3 friends! Perfect party night game for HARDCORE team work =0

name: Crypto Miner Tycoon Simulator
description: Build rigs to mine Bitcoin, Ethereum and other cryptocurrency. Trade on the market to grow wealth. Expand your business into new offices. Hire skilled employees and assign tasks. Use cash from your mega farms to research new technologies and reach the goal of each scenario.

name: In Shape
description: In this minimalistic arcade game, you have to move along a winding plane and switch the shape of your figure to match the passing figures.

name: Trauma
description: Welcome to Trauma, a free-to-play short visual novel full of mysteries. Will you ever be able to smile again?

name: Diaspora
description: The story of a boy and a sheep wandering around The world that's about to collapse

name: Blue Chips
description: Blue Chips is a turn-based strategy board game where you have to survive and attain success in a severe economic world. Try to earn money from trading cryptocurrency, gold, stock exchange and real estate to buy and upgrade your business. Make your opponents bankrupt to become the best.

name: Rise of the Robots X
description: Rise of the Robots X (RoRx) is an online futuristic card-based strategy game played on a hexagonal grid battleground. Played on a hexagonal grid battleground, each game is an opportunity to refine your army and get better Robots, Buildings or Masteries!

name: One Week With You
description: We are in war, but in this hard times I can find a peaceful place with you. A adult love history with magic and fantasy like always.

name: F*ck This Game
description: A difficult arcade game; multitask by controlling 8 minigames at once to reach the highest score you can!

name: Into the Abyss
description: A 1st-person survival horror game. Explore and find your way through horrific environments. Find clues and solve puzzles to advance. Running might be the best way to stay alive.

name: Color Ball
description: In the minimalistic arcade game "Color Ball" you have to control a bouncing ball.

name: Galaxity: Terminal 21 VR
description: Visit Terminal 21, the largest shopping mall in Bangkok, Thailand, right now! You can enjoy window-shopping here. As long as you connect through VR!

name: Jane the Reaper
description: 3D action side-scrolling game with a disaster story.

name: Project Voidcraft
description: Embrace the final frontier and bend it to your will in Project Voidcraft - a space entrepreneurship sim set in the early days of space colonization. Experience a free-form MMO-grade Solar System sandbox where logistics is king, and everything else is up to you.

name: Poly Puzzle: Cats
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with cats.

name: Always the Same Nightmare
description: A fast, dynamic die-and-retry style platformer with varied levels and gameplay. Is a passage too difficult? Stop time! Is a boss too strong? Gain experience and upgrade your weapons! Can you escape this dark and perilous dungeon?

name: Nihongo Heroes
description: Learn Japanese language in a fun way! Smart learning system that teach vocabularies with Japanese alphabet: Hiragana, Katakana and Kanji.

name: Crush the Castle Legacy Collection
description:
The hit Armor Games physics destruction game is back! "Crush the Castle Legacy Collection" lets you revisit the chaos and mayhem of the original series with upscaled graphics and new achievements. Load up your trebuchet with special projectiles to topple your foes and score big to carry yourself to victory.

This collection includes all levels from the original;
- Crush the Castle game
- Crush the Castle: Players Pack game
- Crush the Castle 2 game
- Crush the Castle 2: Players Pack game
- Crush the Castle: Adventures game

name: Trails of Gold Privateers
description: With Trails Of Gold Privateers, you're ready to awake the corsair in you!

name: Survival Girls
description: A survival, base building and crafting game. Explore the island, collect resources and defend your base. Search, craft, hunt or steal to buy weapons and vehicles. Hunt and tame animals, grow your herd and attack your enemies base. A FP/TPS survival of the fittest!

name: B-1ll1
description: B-1ll1 is a post-apocalyptic platformer for hardcore gamers. Play as B-1ll1 in the hunt for energy orbs scattered all around you and get through a world destroyed by a catastrophy that you will learn about.

name: Astronautilus
description: Your ship has crash-landed on a stray rogue planet, and you're out of fuel... It's up to you to delve beneath the frozen surface and find a way to get your ship back into space while fighting strange sea creatures and uncovering the mysteries of the world beneath the ice!

name: V-Fighter 2000
description: v-fighter 2000 - Fans of furious action will appreciate the intensity of passion in this shoot 'em up game. Hop into the cockpit of your starship and embark on a long journey across the galaxies, destroying hordes of enemies ..

name: The Ancients
description: The Ancients is a turn-based survival strategy game where you will manage a hunter-gatherer tribe through the ice age. Every decision you make will affect the tribe culturally and politically.

name: Primafloows
description: Ping pong in unoriginal Punk style

name: ShapeVS
description: ShapeTECH welcomes you to participate in their latest aptitude assessment program, ShapeVS. Gather your friends, family members and even colleagues as you participate in a variety of mini-games designed to test your capability of supporting our new society.

name: Endless Match
description: A game of genre 3 in a row. Pass the speed test, compete with your friends and break your own high score! Nice graphics and good voice acting are waiting for you!

name: Brightness
description: Brightness is an extensive single-player game that takes you to the ruins of ancient temples. The main character has to recover stolen souls hidden among dangerous traps. The stolen spirits levitate helplessly in the darkness of the ruins, waiting to be saved.

name: Hero Clicker
description: Hero clicker is a mix between a clicker game and a rogue-like. It will feature disctinct characters with each their strengths and weaknesses.

name: Songs of Armageddopolis
description: A point'n'click detective game where death is irreversible, intuition is more important than logic, and the main evidence is you.

name: The House of Closed Doors
description: The House of Closed Doors is a game in which you are locked in a mysterious house. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark old mansion. Explore mysterious rooms, collect various items, try to find a way out and stay alive.

name: Ruinlander
description: Ruinlander is an open-world role-playing game with turn-based combat where you must survive in the post-apocalyptic wasteland as long as you can.

name: Unarmed Area
description: Unarmed Area is different real time strategy game. Build your city and command your units then control units in first person shooter mode. Once for all you need to make a choice. Unarmed area or a New civilization.

name: Chef RPG
description: Craft your culinary adventure in a beautiful pixel art world. Manage your restaurants, forage and hunt for ingredients, befriend locals, and grow your culinary empire. What kind of chef will you be?

name: First Light
description: As a Search and Rescue officer, you're no stranger to remote areas. After a freak blizzard strands two people in a remote cabin, you've been sent to help. Play tandem stories of past and present, all while being hunted by a malevolent being of winter and hunger in this story-driven survival horror.

name: Mining Cats
description: Mining Cats is a logic puzzle that involves blasting rocks and creating paths that connect mines of gemstones of the same color.

name: City Country
description: City Country is a city-building game where you manage resources, population, knowledge. You control various sectors of the city like education, medicine, culture, tourism, trading.

name: Friends of Little Yus
description: Friends of little Yus is a game about being the fastest. Get to the flag as fast as possible!

name: Odyssey: Altar of Norax
description: 2D 90s style MMORPG remake of Odyssey Online Classic. This high fantasy RPG in a medieval setting features dark themes centered around political strife and intrigue, various political and religious factions vying for power, and Guilds of humans and NPCs openly fighting in the streets.

name: Heroes of Abyss
description: Heroes of Abyss - a rogue-like tactics army battler. Guide the heroes through rooms full of different creatures. Equip and sacrifice your heroes in procedural dungeons as you fight your enemies!

name: Downroll
description: This is a miniature arcade platformer in which you have to control the ball.

name: 5G VR Football
description: "5G VR Football" is a multiplayer penalty simulator in Virtual Reality.

name: The Forgotten Empire
description: Now, as the Chosen One of the Empire of Atlantis, Lily must go through the most difficult challenges facing the most ferocious monsters of the Deep Sea during her journey to save Atlantis.

name: Pivot of Hearts
description: Game developer Wén Xiàn has a second chance at love, but it’s not what he expects. Will he be able to stray off the beaten path and find true happiness? Play your cards right and find out in Pivot of Hearts, a non-monogamous visual novel!

name: Splatformer
description: A fast paced hyper challenging puzzle platformer with a twist.

name: Superheroes Academy
description: To all Superheroes, their mentors, captains, students, and helpers - we need you to run our Agency and Academy! Run Superheroes Organization, build bases, develop infrastructure, hire heroes, train students, but most of all help the needy and save the world in a superhero real-time strategy game.

name: Stint: Rift Apart
description: Stint: Through the Universes is a: - 2D Platform game with a nostalgic gameplay - Interesting mixture of different genres' mechanics - Tangled story, accompanied with epic cut scenes - Humorous plot and charismatic characters - Great world with more than 50 unique locations

name: Niiikotopia: Sky Fall
description: Manage resources, maintain Niiiko’s population, build defenses, research new technology, design new useful items, … and do whatever you can to protect your cute Niiikos.

name: How to Bathe Your Cat: Drawing
description: It is well known that cats aren' t really fond of water, but, as pet owners, we know that sometimes a good bath is welcome. Draw and use bombs to channel the water and clean your cat!

name: Childlike
description: Use objects not to step on the floor. Do not step on the road outside. Run away from the Guard at school. Run away from the haunted doll.

name: Memoria
description: Help Elena's grandma retrieve her precious memories from the past in Memoria! A compelling story-driven adventure through grandma's neighbourhood. Dive into unique 2D platformer challenges located in the mysterious past to collect grandma's memories.

name: The Throne of Bernicia
description: A classic fantasy role-playing game, telling the tale of the kingdom of Bernicia falling into chaos as the forces of darkness encroach on every front. Answer Queen Amelia's call for help as a brave adventurer seeking fame and fortune in a troubled land.

name: Notoris: The Goblin War
description: Notoris is a fantasy war game featuring a unique combination of classic turn-based mechanics in a non-grid-based system. In it, you can command your soldiers in strategic battles, perform epic feats on battlefield and unravel the mysteries behind the Goblins invasion.

name: Polgar: Magic Detective
description: Discover the mysteries of Polgar and solve magic crimes! Investigate the evidences in each case and hunt down the right creature - don't let the culprit go unpunished!

name: Trust Me, Not Her
description: Lost in a secluded forest, you encounter two mysterious girls. One Good. One Evil. But which is which? And who will you Trust in this thrilling, choice-driven Visual Novel?

name: Labyrinth of death
description: Labyrinth of death - You are a brave knight who wanted to perform feats, but failure - you were caught and thrown into the labyrinth of death! Solve clever combinations of levers and buttons in this adventure game and dodge dangerous enemies to reach the exit of the eerie maze and become a hero!

name: Constellation Tango
description: Constellation Tango is an interstellar 3D turn-based strategy-tactics game. Organize and lead troops to victory in battles across planets. Push back against an oppressive empire to save the galaxy, while making new allies across various species.

name: HyperLeague Heroes
description: Recruit. Upgrade. Battle. Assemble a team of heroes, villains, and monsters and delve into the dungeons of Utopia to face off against waves of enemies. Issue commands to your squad or watch them fight on their own.

name: Snow Battle Princess Sayuki
description: Sayuki, a cute and powerful snow goddess is on a quest to save her beloved human boy, from the evil curse of the demon! An exciting, retro style, scrolling shooter. Go to the world of Japanese myth!

name: Cat Fish Island
description: A relaxing adventure of island fishing. Collect wood and fish to build and bait the most amazing fishing rod the world has ever seen. Start your adventure to catch the mythical fish of legend thought to be only an old tale by the island's inhabitants.

name: Tiny Football
description: Tiny Football is a throw back to old top-down retro soccer games of the 90's. Realistic passing and shooting, tackles, crosses, throw balls, overhead kicks, free kicks and more. Compete with 64 national and club teams in a variety of tournaments.

name: Die, A.I.
description: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle space adventure. Survive the vengeful A.I system that has taken over the ship and killed everyone else onboard. Use your limited oxygen supply and cunning to overcome the failing systems and A.I created booby traps. Explore the ship...and don't die.

name: Banish
description: BANISH is a Single and Co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. As a Priest, you are sent by the local church to a failed exorcism attempt in the Luxford Mansion. Fear, Panic, and Horror awaits you...

name: The Smugglers
description: You will smuggle goods or protect the law. Assemble a team and take on the role of a clever smuggler or an honest law enforcement officer once per turn. Compete against the opposing team on one of many boards. Will you tactically pursue victory or pull a gun? Decide and win!

name: Cubytet
description: Cubytet is a 3D puzzle game in which you need to place pieces of different shapes on the playing field in order to score as many points as possible. This game is based on the world's most famous 2D puzzle game and is its 3D analog with some additional game mechanics!

name: Lakehouse
description: Spend a year studying at the rural Stowford College in a story where your choices actually matter. Join one of the clubs, make new friends, and find love.

name: Spirit and Katana
description: Are you ready for an epic, yet adorable, adventure?! Join the guild waiting for you in the land of Celedain. This is a story about teamwork, friendship, and good times along the way. The bards will be sure to sing soon of your heroism in Spirit and Katana!

name: Creator's Asteroid
description: A tile-based Metroidvania maker! Design and share your worlds with others, or download another player's world and experience their creation!

name: Slice of Life Fantasy
description: Try to get a girlfriend and be a hero at the same time, in the RPG where you get loot from monsters in order to buy your girl stuff, just like real life!

name: Dungeons of Honor
description: Dungeons Of Honor is a Wave Based First Person survival game, with map and weapon selection, fight to survive for as long as possible in medieval history, but, not all is what it seems in these times.

name: Reach for an Angel
description: When youth shine brightly, do your best to fulfill your romantic wish: Reach for the feelings of your loved one. Choose one of the three female protagonist to be your beloved.

name: Cold Harvest
description: Make an incredible Christmas journey, from which you will not be able to tear yourself away until the very end. Playing the game, you will find your holiday spirit too.

name: Tiny Gods of the Nile
description: Welcome to Egypt ! With your friends, play as gods in training and complete magical recipes for your classes ! Have fun : cheat, cast spells… But be careful, Râ your teacher will gladly scold you if you get caught !

name: Solaris Rift
description: Solaris Rift is a roguelike card game featuring variable encounters, sci-fi narrative, and strategic gameplay. Face off against the terrifying storm drones of the Satex Army, the saboteurs of the gang known as the RogueStars, and the venomous vinelings of the Queen of Thorns.

name: Spectral Shades: Fragments
description: Follow Chiharu as she explores an unknown and surreal location, while she tries to figure out what’s going on. -- An exploration-heavy, magical girl themed, eerie adventure game, where two girls fight about poor Chiharu.

name: Mikoshi
description: Twelve levels of dynamic platforming with interesting story, charismatic main character and his friends, ability improvements, epic boss battles, secrets hidden throughout and high quality graphics.

name: Farming Sweeper
description: Build, manage and grow your farm in a unique way: Solving puzzles with traditional minesweeper mechanics and managing your business finances in a relaxing game with great replay factor.

name: Slumber
description: This point-and-click adventure game challenges you to figure out how to escape the haunted house from one of three ghouls, each with its own unique mechanic.

name: Xenoids
description: Xenoids is a survival horror game where you have to come face to face with a hostile life form in the confined space of a spaceship.

name: Just King
description: Just King is an action auto-battler with roguelike elements. Assemble your party to venture into different lands fighting fearsome kings and their deadly armies. Use your loot to hire and upgrade mighty heroes... or the bard.

name: Inquisitor's Heart and Soul
description: Summon demonic invasions, punish heretical enclaves, punish traitors and renegades. Do not deny yourself anything - after all, you are the hand and anger of the highest good. Give the apostates darkness, so that they learn to appreciate the light!

name: Melody in the moonlight
description: A difficult RPG puzzle game. Because of an accident, the two sisters entered a wrong time and space. Please help them find the hidden truth in this false space and time.

name: Puzzle Art: Horses
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with horses.

name: Puzzle Art: Rodents
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with rodents.

name: Puzzle Art: Predators
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with predators.

name: Puzzle Art: Artiodactyls
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with artiodactyls.

name: Steelborn
description: Steelborn - is a run and gun platformer game inspired by the classics and made by a team of Abuse, Ranger-X, Contra, Metal Slug, Blaster Master and H.E.R.O fans.

name: Dig
description: A simple free clicker game

name: Pumpkins
description: Pumpkins is a Halloween themed arcade style puzzle game. Traverse through a set of pumpkin patch mazes while avoiding pests and collecting pumpkins.

name: Veil of the Volcano
description: Create a tribe to survive the natural disasters of the island. Prepare your community for the day the volcano blows. You'll need to survive until the Spring when life returns.

name: Karmadillos
description: Battle to be the last-armadillo-standing in this 2-4 local-player party game, knock each player off the level and place traps between rounds to help your efforts.

name: Stack!
description: Stack! is a challenging physics based game about stacking objects on an unstable platform

name: Infinity Girl
description: Infinity Girl is a high-speed rhythm/racer/roguelite where everything — every action, every enemy and every spectacular world you encounter — is driven by the beat of the music. Each run is unique, with procedural levels that test your skills as you grind, drift, boost and leap to the rhythm.

name: Doki Doki Tri-Line Quest
description: Go on an adventure of self-discovery and search for your dear childhood friend who left the village years ago under strange circumstances. Doki Doki Tri-Line Quest is an rpg game in combination with match3 and exclusive for adults, with sex scenes and voices in English.

name: Godbeast Mk.II
description: The Wolf howls in the moonlight! Scarlet blood will glisten on the dark city streets in this stylish and atmospheric action game.

name: Island of Lust
description: Island of Lust is a trainer-type adult game. Master the mechanics of training your elf and turn her into a shinning example of your skills. The game contains several skills to improve and plenty other characters to help you on your journey.

name: Pool Adventure
description: Probably every person at least once in his life dreamed of getting access to video cameras in a women's locker room. Be a visitor to the pool and spy on naked girls! Relaxing music will let you immerse yourself in this process. See all the girls without exception!

name: Atria-1
description: Charge Game Studio presents a dark Sci-Fi action thriller. Challenge yourself as a space colonist on a Russian ship lost so deep in the Universe that even the strongest com ties are torn. Feel the ruthlessness of cosmos, painful past, and extraordinary events on the ship that all mix up into horror.

name: Serious Breakdown
description: Serious Breakdown is a platformer, in the role of a robot, you need to clean up the levels as much as possible and get the necessary parts. Learn to dodge or kill enemies. At the end of the path, you will need to defeat the main villain of this universe.

name: Ghost Follows
description: A Halloween legend surrounding a cursed old house becomes the lived story of one trick-or-treater who looks to solve the mystery of Spector Manner. Upon entering the house, the energy goes through the roof and the house comes alive.

name: La Maledizione dell'Uccello Serpente
description: A JRPG game with a fantasy setting and retro style. Warning: the game is in Italian.

name: Astralojia
description: A magic school slice-of-life game series, with ATB Turn-Based boss battles. It follows the students of Raynwood Academy as they study and practice martial arts and magic in the world of Astralojia.

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spooky Rush Ep. 4
description: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 5
description: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

description: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Aquaris Planet
description: Welcome to the water world! Paint by numbers and uncover the secrets of the oceans!

name: Tabboz Simulator
description: Tabboz Simulator is an Italian management and life simulation indie game launched in 1997 from Obscured Truckware.

name: Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet
description: I've been h4ving these dreams la7ely. They can't be real...8ut what if they are? I close my eyes and I see her fac3. Follow Locke as he tries to discover the secrets of Yoko in this point and click, cyberpunk noir adventure.

name: Arcana: Heat and Cold - Season 2
description: New adventures of the unskilled magician, his friends and Miley. Fun events, hentai scenes and unique turn-based combat await you.

name: Attack of Undo Zai
description: High definition furry anime characters in a non-stop action shooter with team.

name: Box Rush
description: The Magic Kingdom was attacked by fantastic monsters who erected siege structures around the entire island.

name: Prototype Blocks
description: Prototype Blocks is a puzzle game with many different levels of varying difficulty.

name: Planet Zoo: Europe Pack
description: Experience the beauty of Europe with the Planet Zoo: Europe Pack! Featuring five highly requested new animals (Alpine ibex, Eurasian lynx, European fallow deer, European badger, and fire salamander), these stunning European species will bring wonder and delight to your zoo.

name: Voice
description: Voice is a game about the story of living in a dystopian world where speaking is forbidden.
